name: Darklingo++
description: Hey! üëãüèΩ Darklingo++ is a delightful switch on the default Duolingo UI. This style presents you with a Dark Mode, the ability to change the Theme Color , and it makes both leagues and the scrollbar optional. (More to come in the future) If you find anything that isn't themed correctly, feel free to tell me; feedback is always welcome! üòÅ And if you really like this style or any of my others, you can donate (only if you want to ü§ó). Made with üíñ by Justin Ikeako.
additional_info: LATEST RELEASE: 8.2.6 ‚Ä¢ Crowns in non-gold lesson modals appear as they should MAJOR RELEASES RELEASE 8.0.0 ‚Ä¢ Added theme variants: Slate, Pitch Black & Midnight RELEASE 7.0.0 ‚Ä¢ Complete rewrite ‚Ä¢ Dark mode just got darker ‚Ä¢ Consistently themed icons ‚Ä¢ Consistent interaction feedback ‚Ä¢ Around 60% smaller

._3qbk_ ._1nIcg::before,
._11bKq .dRGy3::before,
